headline: Pool Corporation (POOL): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Pool Corporation on StockOpine’s Newsletter’s Substack by StockOpine. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on POOL. Pool Corporation’s share was trading at $243.37 as of December 1st. POOL’s trailing and forward P/E were 22.19 and 20.75 respectively according to Yahoo Finance.
